alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 4:56AM EST until December 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Merrimack River AT Goffs Falls affecting Rockingham, Hillsborough and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merrimack River at Goffs Falls. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Low lying flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
